name: irrelevantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not related to what is being discussed or considered and therefore not important: "There's a good view," she said irrelevantly. See
irrelevant
More examplesFewer examples"I wonder who slept in the nursery," the doctor said irrelevantly.I found myself wondering, irrelevantly, if he would ever be President. His speech tailed away amiably but irrelevantly to no clear conclusion. "Kathryn does not get to sleep in very often," Steven said honestly, if irrelevantly.
